sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The beginning, progress, and end of man
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-street. Licensed and entred, according to order, [London] : [c. 1688/89]
Actually a metamorphic picture, with verse - "Here Adam first leads up the van,". Printed as a scroll, with title printed perpendicularly, on the left side and the imprint printed perpendicularly on the right-hand side. Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
=======

Actually a metamorphic picture, with verse - "Here Adam first leads up the van,". Printed as a scroll, with title printed perpendicularly, on the left side and the imprint printed perpendicularly on the right-hand side. Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

the Angel in Guiltspur-street. Licensed
